configurationItems.name: check_tlp
configurationItems.description: Define if the analyzer should check TLP of data before running

configurationItems.name: max_tlp
configurationItems.description: Define the maximum TLP level autorized

configurationItems.name: url
configurationItems.description: Define the URL of the service

configurationItems.name: certpath
configurationItems.description: Path to certificate file, in case of self-signed etc.

configurationItems.name: disablereanalyze
configurationItems.description: If set to true, samples won't get re-analyzed.
